name: The Evil Wizard
description:
Description

The Evil Wizard is a narrative platformer game, the adventure of someone who is sucked into the game to find a way out.

created by team Chill Capybara.

Team Member
  • Game & UI Design by Hanii
  • Program by Rokugatsua
  • Arts by Pilgrim
Game Control
  • A to move left
  • D to move right
  • W or Space for jump
  • E for interaction
  • Esc for pause menu and back
  • Arrow Keys for selecting menu
  • Enter for accept in menu
